    • Method Detail

      • create

        public java.lang.String create()
        Creating template "[THREAD <ID:thd_id> <NAME:thd_name> <IS_ALIVE:thd_is_alive> <IS_INTERRUPTED:thd_is_interrupted>]", where thd_id - id, thd_name - name, thd_is_alive - isAlive, thd_is_interrupted - isInterrupted. Example: 
         
 String tml = new TmlThread().create();
 // This code creating template:
 // [THREAD <ID:1> <NAME:main> <IS_ALIVE:true> <IS_INTERRUPTED:false>]
        Specified by:
        create in interface Template
        Returns:
        template as a String.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Name of thread template.
        Specified by:
        name in interface TemplateNamed
        Returns:
        "THREAD".
